title: NetID Activation | Academic Computing and Communications Center | University of Illinois at Chicago
contents:
Skip to the content of this page ,  the main menu , the secondary menu , the site search form , the site home page .           Academic Computing and Communications Center     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Academic Computing and Communications Center      Academic Computing and Communications Center   Main Menu    Services           Communication and Collaboration    Computing Services    Infrastructure    Professional Services    Research    Security    Teaching and Learning         Support           Academic Continuity    Academic Multimedia Lab and Lightboard Studio    ARC Helpdesk    C-Stop BSB    C-Stop LHS    Daley Library Helpdesk    LTS Support Office         Service Status           Service Notices         News           All News         Forms    About           Identity    Leadership    Policies    Reports    Jobs          Eyebrow menu    WebStore    Online Training    Answers    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search               View Menu           Breadcrumbs   Academic Computing and Communications Center    Services    Security    Account Administration    NetID Activation        NetID Activation  To access many authenticated university services and create accounts, new students, faculty, and staff must first activate their UIC NetID.  New students and department sponsored guests external affiliates will use the “UIC NetID Activation” page to activate their NetID. Student NetIDs are assigned automatically upon admission.  Faculty and staff will go through the “UI New Hire” portal to activate their NetID. Faculty and staff NetIDs are self-selected during the UI NewHire process.       Quick Access            Activate your NetID                    Access UI New Hire             Contact Us          hide   AVAILABLE TO: Faculty | Students | Staff  FUNDED BY:  University       Answers  Features  More Info         Common Questions   Common Questions   What is my NetID?  How do I activate my NetID?  How do I get an activation token?  More…              Features    Register for UIC Alert, an optional free emergency notification system  Set your password, used to access many ACCC services , as well as most authenticated University of Illinois computing and networking services  Register password recovery options for self-service management of your password  Set the forwarding of your NetID@uic.edu email address  Create accounts to enable access to additional services            More Info   Requirements  To activate a UIC NetID and access ACCC accounts and services you must agree to the Acceptable Use Policy .              Google Maps image     C-Stop, BSB   1007 West Harrison Street,  Behavioral Sciences Building(BSB), Learning Center, First Floor,  Chicago,  IL    Phone: (312) 413-0003  Website: https://accc.uic.edu/support         Service Level Agreement       Service Request Fulfillment Time  Student NetIDs - Created automatically within 1 business day of being admitted.
                         
Employee NetIDs - Created in real time with a self-service application or online Phonebook Liaison application.

NetIDs for external university affiliates - Request fulfilled in real time with online Phonebook Liaison application.    Incident Resolution Time  An outage of system or process involved in NetID creation and/or password management – restored within 1 business day.

NetID Activation problem, individual - 1 business day.

NetID creation failure, individual - 3 business days.

Correction of identity record errors - Depending on the complexity of error and cross-functional involvement, may take up to 10 business days.    Service Availability  NetID Activation applications Available 24/7

In-person password assistance hours & locations:
C-Stop in Behavioral Sciences Building, 1007 W. Harrison, First Floor
C-Stop in Library of the Health Sciences, 1750 W. Polk Street, First Floor
Hours: 9 am – 5 pm, Mon. – Fri.    Maintenance Window(s)  Standard maintenance for application updates during approved ACCC maintenance window(s).

Database maintenance of directory data and affiliations occurs daily with no downtime.    Service Notification Channel(s)  ACCC Service Notices, REACH distribution email list    Reviewed to Ensure SLA Meets Business Requirements  Provisional SLA - Currently under IT Governance review.
